name: Neon Defence
description:
Everything you need to know should be in the game. Also all the tower spots in the main menu is intractable and you can test stuff like a sandbox there. Theme: Overload, Limitation: Chaos Is Everything

Also credits to creator of Vectorio my main art inspiration! (you can get it for free on steam if you search it. Its actually a amazing game here)

If you don't want to try the towers and find out what they do or just want to know the names I called them then here they are:

Small Guns:

Basic gun - the orange thing shoots out of 2 barrels at level 3 gets another standalone gun.

Spitter tower - the spinning orange thing that just shoots out bullets at a faster rate and spins around aimlessly and at level 2 it's bullets split and at level 3 it gets 2 more barrels.

Rocket launcher - the red one without barrels that shoots out hexagons that explode on impact and anything that touches the explosion dies as well at level 3 it shoots 2 projectiles at once

Big Guns:

Minigun - basically the basic gun but with 3 barrels and a way quicker firerate at level 3 gets a unupgradeable standalone basic gun

Missile spitter - combination of spitter tower and rocket launcher shoots out so many missiles and at level 3 gets 2 more barrels (totally overpowered and needs balancing)
